credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description:
Spot motifs, including a large bouquet of flowers tied with a ribbon at center, surrounded by two houses, flowers, a butterfly, a crown, and a teapot. On four sides, a stylized strawberry vine border. A verse appears at the top: 

First SPRING advancing with her flowry train
Here SUMMERS hand that spreads the sylvan scene
Then AUTUMN with her yellow harvests crownd
And trembling WINTER close the annual round

Charlot Chadwick 1798
name: Sampler
